title: How to Find Old Instagram Bios

steps.title: Open Instagram on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open Instagram on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. It's the orange, purple, and yellow icon with a white camera, and you'll usually find it on your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap on the profile icon.
steps.content: Tap on the profile icon. It's the outline of a person's head and shoulders in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the ☰ menu.
steps.content: Tap the ☰ menu. It's the three horizontal lines at the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Security.
steps.content: Tap Security . It's the 5th option down.

steps.title: Tap Access Data.
steps.content: Tap Access Data . It's the 1st option under Data and History.

steps.title: Tap View All under "Former bio texts."
steps.content: Tap View All under "Former bio texts." This is the 3rd option in the "Profile Info" section.

steps.title: View your former bios.
steps.content: View your former bios. To see additional bios, tap View More . If you want to reuse one of your old bios, follow these steps: Tap and hold the text to select the bio, and then tap Copy . Return to your profile and tap Edit profile . Tap and hold in the "Bio" field and select Paste when it appears.

steps.title: Open Instagram on your computer.
steps.content: Open Instagram on your computer. Open a browser and navigate to https://www.instagram.com .

steps.title: Click the profile icon.
steps.content: Click the profile icon. It's the outline of a head and shoulders in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Click on cog wheel icon.
steps.content: Click on cog wheel icon. It's near the top to the right of the "Edit Profile" button.

steps.title: Click Privacy and Security.
steps.content: Click Privacy and Security . It's the 5th option down on the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Click View Account Data.
steps.content: Click View Account Data . It's the blue link under Account Data .

steps.title: Click View All under "Former bio texts."
steps.content: Click View All under "Former bio texts." This is the 3rd option in the "Profile Info" section.

steps.title: Scroll down to view your former bios.
steps.content: Scroll down to view your former bios. If you want to reuse one of the bios that appear on this screen, follow these steps: Highlight the bio text. Right-click the highlighted area and select Copy . Return to your profile and click Edit Profile . Right-click the "Bio" field and select Paste .
